li.label: in harmony with nature
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} spent {PAWN_possessive} entire life among trees and wild animals. It definitely changed {PAWN_possessive} behavior. {PAWN_nameDef} won't be upset if {PAWN_pronoun} eats raw food without a table. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't care about sleeping on the floor, outside or having damaged clothes, although {PAWN_pronoun} prefers to wear at least something.
